author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: You should probably have some compat info in your project file, at least `julia = "1"`.

Project.toml has been edited with a [compat] section.

~~Will the Registrator pick up that commit?~~ I think I answered my own question.
I recommend you write somet tests and enable continuous integration on the repository.
That's not a requirement though. This looks good to me from the package metadata perspective.

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/wrs28/Kwant.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- e51a9db0-863b-11e9-96f5-c17eef72cd07 -->
Will work on adding tests in CI nonetheless.
